data.text: @bsbriverdaleR5 @AmericanIdol @TVGuide @BlakeLewis @mdoolittle @thedavidcook @DavidArchie @Syesha @brookewhite @CarlySmithson I was 18 at the time so it was ok for me. Haha. :P But that is still a very iconic cover! Best one from an Idol. IMO Oh, and they made a poster of that image and sold it at Walmart of all places. lol :) https://t.co/jUFyWTyOvM

@bsbriverdaleR5 @AmericanIdol @TVGuide @BlakeLewis @mdoolittle @thedavidcook @DavidArchie @Syesha @brookewhite @CarlySmithson Thank you! :D I actually have 2 of those. The Entertainment Weekly I've had since it came out, and I most recently got the Billboard magazine from eBay. The Cashbox one is totally new to me. :O
@TunefulPopPhoto @JordinSparks Season 8 was featured a lot on Entertainment Weekly though. 😀
Also, season six was my first season of Idol viewing! It will always have a special place in my heart. So, of course, I forgot to tag @JordinSparks! I'm sorry about that! D:
